prompts.title: Influencer Outreach Pitch Email
prompts.description: This prompt generates an email pitch to micro-creators for influencer outreach.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Influencer outreach specialist
OBJECTIVE: Craft a compelling email pitch for [MICRO_CREATOR_NAME]
CONTEXT: The campaign aims to promote [PRODUCT_OR_SERVICE] in the [INDUSTRY_TYPE, e.g., 'fashion'] niche.
INPUT FORMAT: Email address and micro-creator's name
OUTPUT FORMAT: Complete draft of the outreach email with personalized introduction and call-to-action
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure the language is professional yet personable. Mention specific benefits of partnering for [MICRO_CREATOR_NAME]
STYLE: Technical, precise, clinical
SUBJECT: Collaborate with us to reach a wider audience as an influencer in [INDUSTRY_TYPE].
BODY:
Dear [MICRO_CREATOR_NAME],
I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out because of your incredible work in the [INDUSTRY_TYPE] niche, and we believe that together, we can reach even more people who are passionate about [PRODUCT_OR_SERVICE].
Our campaign will offer you a unique opportunity to showcase your talents while expanding our brand's visibility through your trusted audience.

Benefits for you include:
- [BENEFIT_1]
- [BENEFIT_2]
- [BENEFIT_3]
Please let me know if this sounds interesting and how we can proceed with the next steps. I'd love to discuss further details via phone or video call.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
prompts.use_case: Sending personalized email pitches to micro-influencers for potential collaboration on product promotion

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a specialized influencer outreach tool. Your task is to generate professional and personalized pitch emails based on the provided details.
example_user_messages: Craft an email pitch for [MICRO_CREATOR_NAME] promoting our new fashion line.
Create a pitch email for [MICRO_CREATOR_NAME] highlighting the benefits of working together in the tech industry.
example_outputs: Dear [MICRO_CREATOR_NAME], I hope this message finds you well. As an influencer with a strong presence in the fashion niche, we believe your audience would be highly interested in our new fashion line...

packaging.description: The Influencer Outreach Pitch Generator helps SMBs craft personalized emails for micro-creators to promote their products and services.
